write_qgis_meta.py¶

Parse a QGIS document and write metadata as an XML file for given layer(s).

usage: write_qgis_meta.py [-h] [--layer LAYER [LAYER ...]] [--outdir OUTDIR]
                          xmlfile

Positional Arguments¶

xmlfile XML file to open and parse

Named Arguments¶

--layer layer(s) to write metadata for. If left empty, writes metadata for each layer.
--outdir directory to write metadata to. If left empty, writes metadata to same directory as original layer.
